alert.note: Alert for Freestone; Limestone; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 8:44PM CDT until September 24 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Freestone County in central Texas... North central Limestone County in central Texas... Southwestern Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 844 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dawson, or 13 miles southwest of Corsicana, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Mexia, Wortham, Coolidge, Dawson, Angus, Lake Mexia, Fort Parker State Park, Navarro Mills Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Retreat, Oak Valley, Tehuacana, Richland, Streetman, Kirvin, Mustang, Dresden, Corbet, and Cotton Gin. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 212 and 228. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
